## BlockDragger.getInsertionMarkers() method

Get a list of the insertion markers that currently exist. Drags have 0, 1, or 2 insertion markers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getInsertionMarkers(): BlockSvg[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md)<!-- -->\[\]
